proven_winners_from_your_channel: Text to 3D Models: This AI Tool Changes Design FOREVER! (461.7%)
ChatGPT-5 Sees Earth Future: 3 Mind-Blowing Climate AI Facts (185.9%)
Instagram FREE AI Photos: Get Photoshop Magic NOW! (71.3%)
Canva Secret AI: Designs YOUR Projects In SECONDS! (70%)
Unlock ChatGPT Pro For FREE! The Microsoft Secret! (68.8%)

must_include: Specific tool name in title (ChatGPT, Canva, Midjourney, Adobe)
SECRET or HIDDEN or FREE angle
content_requirements.hook_structure: Show END RESULT in first 3 seconds (like Text to 3D did)

avoid_based_on_data: Generic 3 AI Tools titles (46%, 26.2%, 11.9% - all failed)
Vague tools without names (TOP YouTubers Secret: 26.2%)
Tools without visual output (hard to show transformation)
upcoming_tools_to_test: Sora (video generation) - test with visual transformation angle
Midjourney v7 (if released) - focus on SECRET parameters

hook_examples_that_worked: This AI turns text into 3D models in SECONDS
ChatGPT-5 just predicted Earth climate future
Instagram FREE AI makes you look like a pro photographer
Canva secret AI designs BETTER than professionals
hook_examples_that_failed: 3 AI tools that will blow your mind (generic - 46%)
Top YouTubers use these 3 AI tools (no specificity - 26.2%)
bullet_structure: Bullet 1: What the tool does and why it is SECRET/HIDDEN/FREE
Bullet 2: How to access it (step-by-step under 15 words)
Bullet 3: Specific result you get (with before/after proof)
script_guidance.cta_template: Next Thursday (Episode [N+1]): I am revealing [NEXT_TOOL] [SECRET_FEATURE]. Subscribe!

visual_pacing.seconds_0_3: Show the END RESULT (3D model, designed graphic, AI output)
visual_pacing.seconds_4_8: Quick problem setup (what you could not do before)
visual_pacing.seconds_9_20: Tool demo (how to use it, 3-5 seconds per step)

quality_gates.max_setup_complexity: Must be accessible in under 2 minutes

tool_teardown_thursday.topics: SAME pool as Tuesday, different specific tools each week
tool_teardown_thursday.script_guidance: IDENTICAL structure - do not mess with 64.6% success

differentiation_from_tuesday.rule: Cover DIFFERENT tools, not different formats

example_week.tuesday: Midjourney SECRET Parameter for Perfect Faces

differentiation_from_tuesday.avoid: Do not make Thursday different - make it SAME FORMAT, different tool

proven_winners_from_your_channel: Rizzbot FLIPPED ME OFF on TikTok LIVE! AI Gone Wild? (80.7%, 333 views)
Adobe AI Runs Your Social Media! Project Moonlight Explodes! (91.1%, 65 views)
AWS Outage Gave AI Brain Rot?! Here is The SHOCKING Truth! (77.9%, 5 views)
Your Brain Is The NEW Control Panel! (63.1%, 208 views)

must_include: Shock value or entertainment angle (not just news)
Immediate WTF moment in first 3 seconds
Personal impact (how it affects viewer TODAY)
content_requirements.hook_structure: Lead with the shocking/entertaining moment, explain after

include: Game-changing AI announcements with clear demo
Brain/psychology AI applications (Your Brain Control Panel: 63.1%)
proven_failures_to_avoid: Generic news: Clippy is BACK! Microsoft New AI (32.3%)
Vague threats: Your Secret Digital Guardians (0% - WORST EVER)
Negative framing without resolution: FAILED, HACKED (31.8%, 26.8%)
topics.filter_rule: Only post if it has ENTERTAINMENT value, not just news value

hook_examples_that_worked: A TikTok AI bot just flipped me off LIVE
Adobe AI is now running entire social media accounts
AWS outage gave AI literal brain rot
Your brain is becoming an AI control panel
hook_examples_that_failed: Microsoft Clippy is back with new AI (boring - 32.3%)
Your data might not be safe with Copilot (fear-based - 35%)
New digital guardians are protecting you (vague - 0%)
script_guidance.cta_template: Tuesday tool demo: [RELATED_TOOL]. Follow so you do not miss it!

bridge_to_tuesday.rule: Always connect Saturday entertainment to Tuesday practical tool
bridge_to_tuesday.example: Rizzbot went viral then Tuesday: ChatGPT SECRET Conversation Tricks

ai_news_roundup.what_we_learned: News without entertainment or actionable value = failure

failed_examples: Unlock Your Brain: 3 AI Hacks You NEED Right Now! (10.5%)
3 AI Hacks to Supercharge Your Day! (19.0%)
secret_prompts_thursday_generic.what_we_learned: Generic AI Hacks fail. Specific ChatGPT Email Prompts work.
secret_prompts_thursday_generic.solution: Merged into tool_teardown format with specific tool focus

categorization_fixes.note: These videos were miscategorized by the backfill script
should_be_tool_teardown: ChatGPT SECRET Email Prompts (was: tool_teardown, correct!)
ChatGPT SECRET Productivity Hack (was: tool_teardown, correct!)
categorization_fixes.pattern: If title has ChatGPT SECRET then tool_teardown_tuesday (already correct)
